item.title: 使用vue3+typescript实现与后端的grpc通信
item.description: 使用vue3+typescript实现grpc, makefile: NODE_BIN_PATH=./node_modules/.bin OUT_DIR=./src/proto ifeq ($(GOHOSTOS), windows) #the `find.exe` is different from `find` in bash/shell. #to see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/find. #changed to use git-bash.exe to run find cli or other cli friendly, caused of every developer has a Git. Git_Bash= $(subst cmd\,bin\bash.exe,$(dir $(shell where git))) INTERNAL_PROTO_FILES=$(shell $(Git_Bash) -c "find app -name *.proto") API_PROTO_FILES=$(shell $(Git_Bash) -c 'find proto -path proto/third_party -prune -o -name "*.proto" | grep -v "^proto/third_party"') else INTERNAL_PROTO_FILES=$(shell find app -name *.
